name: iCribbageBoard
description:
iCribbageBoard is a beautiful, fully functional cribbage board designed specifically for your iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch.

If you have a friend and a deck of cards, then you can play a game of cribbage anywhere with this stunning app.

Features:

-Support for 3 players (or a 2v2 doubles match).
-Simple interface.
-Scoreboard with win counters.
-Easily move pegs in increments of one or five points.
-Remove wrongly taken points with the minus button.
-Track your progress with Game Center leaderboards and achievements.
-Comes with two boards, more are available in the store.

Finally, with iCribbageBoard you can easily bring a cribbage board with you anywhere you go.



Keep getting your points mugged? Download Cribbage Flash to improve your card counting skills!
